message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with solving a linear system of equations with sparse solutions, which is a common problem in information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The problem is also related to computer vision (cs.CV) as the authors model the problem of face recognition from video as a multiple measurement vector problem. The use of randomized algorithms and Monte Carlo simulations suggests a numerical analysis (cs.NA) aspect to the paper. Finally, the proposed algorithm involves modifying the Kaczmarz algorithm, which is a well-known iterative method in numerical linear algebra (cs.SI).
